channel.title: Yoshi's New Island
channel.description: I just got it the other day and it's pretty great. The gameboy advanced version was actually my very first video game so it has more meaning to me. It's pretty fun and almost exactly like the gba version except 3d, new bosses and new power ups. I also got pokemon y for free :) anyone else play it? What do you guys think?

item.title: Yoshi's New Island
